name: Fishing Expedition
description:
You long to go boat fishing, but alas, you do not have a boat.
You can start by fishing from the shore to procure the funds.
There must be a way to expedite this fishing expedition...

Directions
  1. Walk around with w,a,s,d (or control stick).
  2. When facing water, press spacebar (or trigger) to cast.
  3. When the bobber moves, press spacebar (or trigger) again.
  4. Talk to the merchant for fishing gear upgrades.
Information
  • Hooks affect catch chance.
  • Bobbers affect rare fish chance.
  • Rods affect fish multiplier chance.
  • The boat is your end goal.
Credits
